Posts.Content: Sep 10, 2018 12:39PM - edited Sep 10, 2018 12:41PM by Nikkix2 I am sorry that you have to go through this again but glad you received your results. The waiting is awful. I have received the cancer diagnosis but the lab said they needed more time for HR and Her2 status. Unfortunately, it looks like a few of us on this thread are on our second go round with this horrible disease.
